name: HabeshaSpotNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my Habesha Spot flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
Our mission is to provide a unique and pioneering experience designed at bringing communities closer together and providing a fantastic service on every corner of the globe. This amazing new app was built with exactly that mission in mind, a campaign to connect the Habesha community and to help it thrive. Share the Habesha Spot app for your friends , family and build the community stronger.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
